instruction: How does the global HTML template system work?
input: Explain the global email template system
output: I'll explain the global HTML template system used in your RSVP application. Here's how it works: **Global Template System Architecture:** **1. Template Storage:** - Global templates are stored in the `GlobalHTMLTemplate` database table - Only one template can be active at a time (`isActive: true`) - Templates include full HTML structure with CSS styling **2. API Endpoint:** ``` GET /api/admin/global-template ``` **Response:** ```json { "html": "\n\n\n \n \n {{subject}}\n \n \n\n\n \n\n" } ``` **3. Template Variables:** The global template supports these variable categories: **Campaign Template Variables:** - `{{subject}}` - Email subject line - `{{greeting_title}}` - Greeting title - `{{greeting_message}}` - Greeting message - `{{main_content_title}}` - Main content title - `{{main_content_body}}` - Main content body - `{{button_text}}` - Call-to-action button text - `{{button_link}}` - Call-to-action button link - `{{additional_info_title}}` - Additional info title - `{{additional_info_body}}` - Additional info body - `{{closing_title}}` - Closing title - `{{closing_message}}` - Closing message **Global Template Variables:** - `{{global_hero_title}}` - Hero section title - `{{global_hero_message}}` - Hero section message - `{{global_signature_name}}` - Signature name - `{{global_signature_title}}` - Signature title - `{{global_signature_company}}` - Signature company - `{{global_signature_location}}` - Signature location - `{{global_event_title}}` - Event details title - `{{global_event_date}}` - Event date - `{{global_event_time}}` - Event time - `{{global_event_location}}` - Event location - `{{global_event_cost}}` - Event cost - `{{global_event_includes}}` - What's included **Business Variables:** - `{{business_name}}` - Business name - `{{business_id}}` - Business ID - `{{invite_link}}` - RSVP invite link - `{{unsubscribe_link}}` - Unsubscribe link **4. Template Processing:** ```javascript // In email-template.ts export async function generateEmailHTML(content) { // Fetch global template from API const response = await fetch('/api/admin/global-template'); const { html } = await response.json(); // Replace all variables in template const finalHTML = html .replace(/\{\{subject\}\}/g, content.subject) .replace(/\{\{greeting_title\}\}/g, content.greeting_title) .replace(/\{\{main_content_body\}\}/g, content.body) // ... all other variable replacements // Add tracking pixel const trackingPixel = ``; return finalHTML + trackingPixel; } ``` **5. Template Structure:** - **Header**: Logo, subject line - **Hero Section**: Green bar with hero title/message - **Content Sections**: Greeting, main content, buttons - **Event Details**: Structured event information - **Signature**: Professional signature block - **Footer**: Social links, unsubscribe, copyright **6. Styling Features:** - Responsive design with mobile breakpoints - Evergreen Web Solutions branding (green theme) - Professional typography using Inter font - Email-client compatible CSS - Social media links with icons - Accessibility features (ARIA labels, alt text) **7. Template Management:** ``` POST /api/admin/global-template ``` **Request:** ```json { "html": "..." } ``` **Response:** ```json { "message": "Global template updated successfully", "html": "...", "id": "template-id" } ``` **8. Integration with Campaign System:** - Campaign templates store content in `htmlBody` field - Global template wraps campaign content - Variables are replaced during email generation - Tracking pixels are automatically added - Both HTML and text versions are generated This system ensures consistent branding and styling across all email campaigns while allowing flexible content customization.

instruction: What template variables are available for email campaigns?
input: Show me all the template variables I can use
output:
I'll show you all the template variables available in your RSVP email system. Here's the complete list: **CAMPAIGN TEMPLATE VARIABLES** (Stored in CampaignTemplate database fields) **Basic Content Variables:** - `{{subject}}` - Email subject line - `{{greeting_title}}` - Greeting section title - `{{greeting_message}}` - Greeting section message - `{{main_content_title}}` - Main content section title - `{{main_content_body}}` - Main content section body - `{{button_text}}` - Call-to-action button text - `{{button_link}}` - Call-to-action button link - `{{additional_info_title}}` - Additional information title - `{{additional_info_body}}` - Additional information body - `{{closing_title}}` - Closing section title - `{{closing_message}}` - Closing section message **Signature Variables:** - `{{signature_name}}` - Signature person name - `{{signature_title}}` - Signature person title - `{{signature_company}}` - Signature company name - `{{signature_location}}` - Signature location **GLOBAL TEMPLATE VARIABLES** (Used in global HTML template) **Hero Section:** - `{{global_hero_title}}` - Hero section title (default: "Welcome to Evergreen AI") - `{{global_hero_message}}` - Hero section message (default: "Thank you for your interest...") **Global Signature:** - `{{global_signature_name}}` - Global signature name (default: "Gabriel Lacroix") - `{{global_signature_title}}` - Global signature title (default: "AI Solutions Specialist") - `{{global_signature_company}}` - Global signature company (default: "Evergreen Web Solutions") - `{{global_signature_location}}` - Global signature location (default: "Terrace, BC") **Event Details:** - `{{global_event_title}}` - Event details title (default: "Event Details") - `{{global_event_date}}` - Event date (default: "October 23rd, 2025") - `{{global_event_time}}` - Event time (default: "6:00 PM - 8:00 PM") - `{{global_event_location}}` - Event location (default: "Terrace, BC") - `{{global_event_cost}}` - Event cost (default: "Free") - `{{global_event_includes}}` - What's included (default: "Coffee, refreshments...") **BUSINESS & TRACKING VARIABLES** (Generated dynamically) **Business Information:** - `{{business_name}}` - Recipient's business name - `{{business_id}}` - Recipient's business ID - `{{email}}` - Recipient's email address - `{{name}}` - Recipient's full name **Links & Tracking:** - `{{invite_link}}` - RSVP invite link with tracking - `{{unsubscribe_link}}` - Unsubscribe link - `{{inviteToken}}` - Unique invite token for tracking **VARIABLE USAGE EXAMPLES** **In Campaign Template (htmlBody):** ```html

{{greeting_title}}

{{greeting_message}}

{{main_content_title}}

{{main_content_body}}

{{button_text}} ``` **In Global Template:** ```html
{{global_hero_title}}

{{global_hero_message}}

{{greeting_title}}

{{main_content_body}}

{{button_text}}

{{global_event_title}}

Date: {{global_event_date}}

Time: {{global_event_time}}

``` **VARIABLE REPLACEMENT PROCESS** **1. Campaign Template Processing:** ```javascript // Replace campaign variables in template content const processedContent = templateContent .replace(/\{\{\s*business_name\s*\}\}/g, context.business_name) .replace(/\{\{\s*invite_link\s*\}\}/g, context.invite_link); ``` **2. Global Template Processing:** ```javascript // Replace all variables in global template const finalHTML = globalTemplate .replace(/\{\{subject\}\}/g, subject) .replace(/\{\{greeting_title\}\}/g, greeting_title) .replace(/\{\{main_content_body\}\}/g, body) .replace(/\{\{global_hero_title\}\}/g, global_hero_title) .replace(/\{\{global_event_date\}\}/g, global_event_date); ``` **VARIABLE DEFAULTS** **Global Template Defaults:** - `global_hero_title`: "Welcome to Evergreen AI" - `global_hero_message`: "Thank you for your interest in our upcoming informational session..." - `global_signature_name`: "Gabriel Lacroix" - `global_signature_title`: "AI Solutions Specialist" - `global_signature_company`: "Evergreen Web Solutions" - `global_signature_location`: "Terrace, BC" - `global_event_date`: "October 23rd, 2025" - `global_event_time`: "6:00 PM - 8:00 PM" - `global_event_location`: "Terrace, BC" - `global_event_cost`: "Free" - `global_event_includes`: "Coffee, refreshments, networking, and actionable AI insights" **Best Practices:** - Use `{{variable_name}}` syntax (double curly braces) - Variables are case-sensitive - Use meaningful variable names - Test templates with sample data - Provide fallback content for optional variables - Keep variable names consistent across templates

FINAL EMAIL STRUCTURE** The final email combines: - **Global Template**: HTML structure, CSS styling, branding - **Campaign Content**: Your specific message content - **Dynamic Variables**: Business info, tracking links, personalization - **Tracking**: Pixel tracking, link tracking, engagement tracking **5. TEMPLATE VARIABLE HIERARCHY** **Priority Order:** 1. **Campaign Template Variables** - Your specific content 2. **Global Template Variables** - System-wide defaults 3. **Business Variables** - Dynamic recipient data 4. **Tracking Variables** - Generated links and tokens **6. BEST PRACTICES** **Template Design:** - Use semantic HTML structure - Include both HTML and text versions - Test with sample data - Keep content concise and focused - Use consistent variable naming **Variable Usage:** - Always provide fallback content - Use meaningful variable names - Test variable replacement - Document custom variables - Keep variables consistent across templates **Integration:** - Campaign templates store content only - Global template provides structure and styling - Variables are replaced during email generation - Both systems work together seamlessly This system ensures consistent branding while allowing flexible content customization for each campaign.
